column2:
"It’s a surprise that many people are
uncomfortable with narrow areas."

"They're probably not claustrophobic
but their movements will be unnatural
as long as they fear the narrowness."

"If only they can still be regarded as
Samurai. Nonetheless experiments
and challenges are necessary for this."

"Of course I think that you are
absolutely fine. And I'll rely on you
to lead the way as always!"

"狭いとこが苦手って人は
意外と多いんだよねー。"

"閉所恐怖症とまでは言わないけど
狭いと落ち着かなくて
思いどおりに動けないんだとか。"

"そういう人にこそブレイバーとか
言えるといいなー、って思ってさ。
実験実験、お試し挑戦だよ。"

"もちろんあなたは大丈夫だと思うけど。
いつもどおり先導よろしくね！"
